name: Bob's Story
description:
Carl The Cube Games Presents Bob's Epic Amazing Quest Story, Showcased in the tradition of vintage 80s Choose Your Adventure Games. 

Bob's story leads you on a Spectacular Thrilling Legend...(Wait for it)...dary quest to do...something. 

HOW TO PLAY:   click the game's Top text to read what it says before you make a decision. the tutorial Section at the start of the game will tell you everything else you'll need to play

With an Amazing Cast of characters That's Sure to That might bring a smile to your face, Bob's Incredible Journey Story is a 2020 must play The perfect game Definitely a game, that you should can totally play...
